fonts.heading: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol"
fonts.body: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol"

property.common: background-color, border-color, color, fill, stroke, opacity, box-shadow, transform

sidebar.bgGradient: linear(to-r, transparent calc(100% - 4px), rgba(0,0,0,0.01) calc(100% - 1px),  blackAlpha.100)
